title: Spoon, 1986-113-2, 1880
markings: On reverse of bowl: "[lion passant]/[anchor]/ G (Gorham mark)/ STERLING."
description: Bowl of spoon elongated oval, gilded, with band of fine bright-cut zig-zag engraving at inside lip. Connected to stem of square section, twisted to create spiral. Finial of flattened spherical turned button with central bead. Stem and finial of plain silver. Bowl of spoon of elongated oval shape, gilded, with band of fine zig-zag bright-cut engraving at inside lip of bowl. Stem of square section, twisted one to create spiral. Finial of flattened spherical turned button with central bead. Stem and finial of plain silver.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005
